name: Freddy Fazbear Pizzeria Simulator VR
description:
This is a remastered version of the game that I created around a year ago. The outdated version can be played on GameJolt. The remastered version will be released on 6/16 at around 2pm EST.

Requirements
  • Steam VR
  • Steam Client Installed and Open
  • A PCVR headset with two controllers (Vive, Oculus, Index, etc)
  • A GameJolt Account (optional)
    • To login you need your username and your game token. You can find your game token by clicking on your profile and selecting "Game Token"
  • The game is best played seated, make sure you have enough space in front of you.
  • Minimum System Requirments:
    • OS: Windows 8 or 10
    • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce Gtx 970 / AMD R9 360
    • Storage: 1+ GB available space
Description

Freddy Fazbear Pizzeria Simulator VR is my take on the original game adapted into VR. 

 This game does not include the tycoon portion of the original FFPS. The game only features the Office section and Salvaging.

 Link to the FFPS VR discord: https://discord.gg/PMh8skn
